title: US-based Tanzanian activist blames government for Instagram ban
description: Meta confirms it removed Mange Kimambi's social media accounts for violating their policy.
content:
Alfred Lasteck,BBC Africa, Dar es Salaamand
Prominent Tanzanian activist Mange Kimambi has accused the government of instigating the removal of her social media accounts that she has been using to m… [+5208 chars]
